text: Per pool, Romney tells OH volunteers their help "is critical because this is a big day for big change and we're about to change America."
author: SarahHuisenga

text: During a stop at a Wendy's Romney was asked why he came to Ohio, "Its an important state. A great state," he said.
author: SarahHuisenga

text: At a quick Wendy's stop with Romney, Ryan was asked how he's doing. "I'm running on empty" he said.
author: SarahHuisenga

text: After greeting volunteers, Romney & Ryan are now at...Wendy's!
author: SarahHuisenga

text: @shermach Yo.
author: SarahHuisenga

text: Romney and Ryan have arrived at the Richmond Heights Victory Center (outside Cleveland) to thank volunteers, per pool.

author: SarahHuisenga
